021import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.modify.HoldingsModifier;
023import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.modify.HoldingsOperation;
024import net.tnemc.core.actions.ActionSource;
025import net.tnemc.core.config.DataConfig;
026import net.tnemc.core.config.MainConfig;
027import net.tnemc.core.io.storage.dialect.TNEDialect;
028import net.tnemc.core.manager.TransactionManager;
029import net.tnemc.core.transaction.Receipt;
030import net.tnemc.core.transaction.TransactionParticipant;
031import net.tnemc.core.utils.Identifier;
032import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.Datable;
033import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageConnector;
034import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.connect.SQLConnector;
035import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
036import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
037
038import java.math.BigDecimal;
039import java.sql.ResultSet;
040import java.sql.SQLException;
041import java.util.ArrayList;
042import java.util.Collection;
043import java.util.List;
044import java.util.Locale;
045import java.util.Optional;
046import java.util.UUID;
047
048/**
049 *
050 */
051public class SQLReceipt implements Datable<Receipt> {
052
053  /**
054   * The class that is represented by the O parameter.
055   *
056   * @return The class that represents the parameter.
057   */
058  @Override
059  public Class<? extends Receipt> clazz() {
060
061    return Receipt.class;
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * USed to purge the objects of this datable.
066   *
067   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
068   */
069  @Override
070  public void purge(final StorageConnector<?> connector) {
071
072    if(connector instanceof final SQLConnector sql && sql.dialect() instanceof final TNEDialect tne) {
073      sql.executeUpdate(tne.receiptPurge(DataConfig.yaml().getInt("Data.Purge.Transaction.Days")),
074                        new Object[]{});
075    }
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Used to store this object.
080   *
081   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
082   * @param receipt   The object to be stored.
083   */
084  @Override
085  public void store(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @NotNull final Receipt receipt, @Nullable final String identifier) {
086
087    if(connector instanceof final SQLConnector sql && sql.dialect() instanceof final TNEDialect tne) {
088
089      //Store the receipt info
090      sql.executeUpdate(tne.saveReceipt(),
091                        new Object[]{
092                                receipt.getId().toString(),
093                                new java.sql.Timestamp(receipt.getTime()),
094                                receipt.getType(),
095                                receipt.getSource().name(),
096                                receipt.getSource().type(),
097                                receipt.isArchive(),
098                                receipt.isVoided(),
099                                receipt.isArchive(),
100                                receipt.isVoided()
101                        });
102
103      storeParticipant(connector, receipt.getFrom(), receipt.getModifierFrom(), "from", receipt.getId().toString());
104      storeParticipant(connector, receipt.getTo(), receipt.getModifierTo(), "to", receipt.getId().toString());
105    }
106  }
107
108  private void storeParticipant(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @Nullable final TransactionParticipant participant,
109                                @Nullable final HoldingsModifier modifier, final String type, @NotNull final String identifier) {
110
111    if(connector instanceof final SQLConnector sql && sql.dialect() instanceof final TNEDialect tne
112       && participant != null && modifier != null) {
113
114      //store participant info
115      sql.executeUpdate(tne.saveParticipant(),
116                        new Object[]{
117                                identifier,
118                                participant.getId(),
119                                type,
120                                participant.getTax()
121                        });
122
123      //store holdings
124      for(final HoldingsEntry entry : participant.getStartingBalances()) {
125        storeReceiptHolding(connector, entry, participant.getId().toString(), identifier, false);
126      }
127
128      for(final HoldingsEntry entry : participant.getEndingBalances()) {
129        storeReceiptHolding(connector, entry, participant.getId().toString(), identifier, true);
130      }
131
132      //store modifier
133      sql.executeUpdate(tne.saveModifier(),
134                        new Object[]{
135                                identifier,
136                                participant.getId(),
137                                type,
138                                modifier.getOperation().name(),
139                                modifier.getRegion(),
140                                modifier.getCurrency().toString(),
141                                modifier.getModifier()
142                        });
143    }
144  }
145
146  private void storeReceiptHolding(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @NotNull final HoldingsEntry entry, final String participant,
147                                   final String receipt, final boolean ending) {
148
149    if(connector instanceof final SQLConnector sql && sql.dialect() instanceof final TNEDialect tne) {
150      sql.executeUpdate(tne.saveReceiptHolding(),
151                        new Object[]{
152                                receipt,
153                                participant,
154                                ending,
155                                MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Name"),
156                                entry.getRegion(),
157                                entry.getCurrency().toString(),
158                                entry.getHandler().asID(),
159                                entry.getAmount()
160                        });
161    }
162  }
163
164  /**
165   * Used to store all objects of this type.
166   *
167   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
168   */
169  @Override
170  public void storeAll(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @Nullable final String identifier) {
171
172    if(connector instanceof SQLConnector && identifier != null) {
173
174      for(final Receipt receipt : TransactionManager.receipts().getReceipts().values()) {
175        store(connector, receipt, identifier);
176      }
177    }
178  }
179
180  /**
181   * Used to load this object.
182   *
183   * @param connector  The storage connector to use for this transaction.
184   * @param identifier The identifier used to identify the object to load.
185   *
186   * @return The object to load.
187   */
188  @Override
189  public Optional<Receipt> load(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @NotNull final String identifier) {
190
191    //We shouldn't load individual Receipts, it doesn't make sense to me/no use case with caching. - creatorfromhell
192    return Optional.empty();
193  }
194
195  /**
196   * Loads a Receipt object from a ResultSet.
197   *
198   * @param result The ResultSet containing the data to load into a Receipt object.
199   *
200   * @return An Optional containing the loaded Receipt object. Returns an empty Optional if the
201   * ResultSet is empty.
202   *
203   * @throws SQLException if an error occurs while accessing the ResultSet data.
204   */
205  public Receipt load(final ResultSet result, final SQLConnector sql, final TNEDialect dialect) throws SQLException {
206
207    //SQL Columns: uid, performed, receipt_type, receipt_source, receipt_source_type, archive, voided
208    final Receipt receipt = new Receipt(
209            UUID.fromString(result.getString("uid")),
210            result.getTimestamp("performed").getTime(),
211            result.getString("receipt_type")
212    );
213    receipt.setSource(ActionSource.create(result.getString("receipt_source"), result.getString("receipt_source_type")));
214    receipt.setArchive(result.getBoolean("archive"));
215    receipt.setVoided(result.getBoolean("voided"));
216
217    return receipt;
218  }
219
220  public void loadParticipants(final Receipt receipt, final SQLConnector sql, final TNEDialect dialect) {
221
222    try(final ResultSet result = sql.executeQuery(dialect.loadParticipants(), new Object[]{
223            receipt.getId().toString() })) {
224      while(result.next()) {
225
226        final String type = result.getString("participant_type").toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT);
227        final UUID id = UUID.fromString(result.getString("participant"));
228        final BigDecimal tax = result.getBigDecimal("tax");
229
230        final TransactionParticipant participant = new TransactionParticipant(id, new ArrayList<>());
231        participant.getStartingBalances().addAll(loadHoldings(receipt.getId(), id, false, sql, dialect));
232        participant.getEndingBalances().addAll(loadHoldings(receipt.getId(), id, true, sql, dialect));
233
234        participant.setTax(tax);
235        final Optional<HoldingsModifier> modifier = loadModifier(receipt.getId(), id, type, sql, dialect);
236
237        if(type.equals("from")) {
238          receipt.setFrom(participant);
239          modifier.ifPresent(receipt::setModifierFrom);
240        } else {
241          receipt.setTo(participant);
242          modifier.ifPresent(receipt::setModifierTo);
243        }
244      }
245    } catch(final Exception ignore) { }
246  }
247
248  public Optional<HoldingsModifier> loadModifier(final UUID receiptID, final UUID participant,
249                                                 final String type, final SQLConnector sql, final TNEDialect dialect) {
250
251    HoldingsModifier modifier = null;
252    //participant, participant_type, operation, region, currency AS currency, modifier  - uid/participant
253    try(final ResultSet result = sql.executeQuery(dialect.loadReceiptHolding(), new Object[]{
254            receiptID.toString(), participant, type })) {
255
256      if(result.next()) {
257
258        modifier = new HoldingsModifier(
259                result.getString("region"),
260                UUID.fromString(result.getString("currency")),
261                result.getBigDecimal("modifier"),
262                HoldingsOperation.valueOf(result.getString("operation")));
263      }
264    } catch(final Exception ignore) { }
265    return Optional.ofNullable(modifier);
266  }
267
268  public List<HoldingsEntry> loadHoldings(final UUID receiptID, final UUID participant, final boolean ending,
269                                          final SQLConnector sql, final TNEDialect dialect) {
270
271    final List<HoldingsEntry> holdings = new ArrayList<>();
272
273    //participant, ending, server, region, currency AS currency, holdings_type, holdings - uid/participant
274    try(final ResultSet result = sql.executeQuery(dialect.loadReceiptHolding(), new Object[]{
275            receiptID.toString(), participant, ending })) {
276
277      while(result.next()) {
278
279        final HoldingsEntry entry = new HoldingsEntry(
280                result.getString("region"),
281                UUID.fromString(result.getString("currency")),
282                result.getBigDecimal("holdings"),
283                Identifier.fromID(result.getString("holdings_type"))
284        );
285        holdings.add(entry);
286      }
287    } catch(final Exception ignore) { }
288
289    return holdings;
290  }
291
292  /**
293   * Used to load all objects of this type.
294   *
295   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
296   *
297   * @return A collection containing the objects loaded.
298   */
299  @Override
300  public Collection<Receipt> loadAll(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @Nullable final String identifier) {
301
302    final Collection<Receipt> receipts = new ArrayList<>(); // is this required? Not entirely sure it is - seems maybe a waste
303    if(connector instanceof final SQLConnector sql && sql.dialect() instanceof final TNEDialect tne) {
304
305      try(final ResultSet result = sql.executeQuery(tne.loadReceipts(), new Object[0])) {
306
307        while(result.next()) {
308
309          final Receipt receipt = load(result, sql, tne);
310
311          receipts.add(receipt);
312          TransactionManager.receipts().log(receipt);
313        }
314
315      } catch(final Exception ignore) { }
316    }
317    return receipts;
318  }
319}
